Shirts!

Thank you to all the people around the world who’ve purchased shirts. We usually have them in stock in various sizes.

Here’s what’s in stock as of August 20, 2017:

Size Color Quantity Cost
M Gray Blue 3 $20
M Muted Blue 2 $20
M Brown 1 $20
XXL Purple 1 $22
XXL Brown 1 $22
XXL Muted Blue 3 $22
XXL Forest Green 1 $22
XXXL Black 2 $22

Shipping in the US is $5. Shipping elsewhere is $13. You can pay via PayPal, Venmo, or Square Cash.
